channel.title: Jaehyun Song, Ph.D.
channel.description: Recent content on Jaehyun Song, Ph.D.

item.title: 一致性と不偏性
item.description: library(tidyverse) df <- tibble(Trial = paste0("Trial", 1:1000000), X1 = rnorm(1000000, 0, 100), X2 = rnorm(1000000, 0, 100), X3 = rnorm(1000000, 0, 100)) df %>% mutate(Max_Abs_X = case_when(abs(X1) > abs(X2) & abs(X2) > abs(X3) ~ X1, abs(X2) > abs(X3) ~ X2, TRUE ~ X3)) %>% ungroup() %>% summarise(Max_X_bar = mean(Max_Abs_X)) 一致性とは 一致性はサンプルサイズが大きくな
